########################################
#
# CMake file for Python wrapper:_Base
#
########################################

# Third Party dependencies of this module
include_directories( ${BOOST_INCLUDE_DIR}
                     ${PYTHON_INCLUDE_DIR} )

# Sire include paths
include_directories( BEFORE ${SIRE_INCLUDE_DIR}/SireBase
                            ${SIRE_INCLUDE_DIR} )

# Other python wrapping directories
include_directories(${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR})

# Get the list of autogenerated files
include(CMakeAutogenFile.txt)

# Define the sources in SireBase
set ( WRAPBASE_SOURCES

      autoconvert_Slice.cpp
      _Base.main.cpp

      ${PYPP_SOURCES}

    )

# Create the library that holds all of the class wrappers
add_library (Base ${WRAPBASE_SOURCES})

set_target_properties (Base
                       PROPERTIES
                         VERSION ${SIRE_VERSION}
                         SOVERSION ${SIRE_VERSION_MAJOR}
                         OUTPUT_NAME "Base"
                         PREFIX "_"
                         SUFFIX ${PYTHON_MODULE_EXTENSION}
		       )

target_link_libraries (Base
                       SirePython
                       SIRE_SireBase
                       SIRE_SireCAS
                       ${Boost_LIBRARIES}
                      )

include( LimitSirePythonExportSymbols )
export_this_symbol_only( "init_Base" "_init_Base" )

# installation
set( INSTALLDIR ${SIRE_PYTHON}/sire/legacy/Base )

install( TARGETS Base
         LIBRARY DESTINATION ${INSTALLDIR}
         ARCHIVE DESTINATION ${INSTALLDIR}
         RUNTIME DESTINATION ${INSTALLDIR}
        )

install( FILES __init__.py
         DESTINATION ${INSTALLDIR}
       )
